# 目的
tidyverse（`dplyr`/`tidyr`）で長↔広変換と安全な join を学ぶ。

```r
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
counts <- tibble(gene=paste0("gene",1:4), S1=c(10,0,3,1), S2=c(9,2,6,0))
meta   <- tibble(sample=c("S1","S2"), group=c("ctrl","trt"))
long <- counts |> pivot_longer(-gene, names_to="sample", values_to="count") |> left_join(meta, by="sample")
long
```
